name: Url-Shortener-bot-V2
description: Make short link by using Shortener using API key

METHOD.description: Select your preferred METHOD between droplink or mdisk. Enter exactly droplink or mdisk in lowercase

DROPLINK_API.description: Enter your ZAGL API KEY only if METHOD is selected to droplink. Get your API from https://zagl.in/member/tools/api

MDISK_API.description: Enter your MDISK API KEY only if METHOD is selected to mdisk. Get your API_ID from t.me/VideoToolMoneyTreebot

INCLUDE_DOMAIN.description: Use this option if you want to short only links from the given domains list. Separate each domain by comma, Works only when mode is selected to droplink

EXCLUDE_DOMAIN.description: Use this option if you wish to short every link on your website but exclude only the links from the given domains list. Separate each domain by comma, Works only when mode is selected to droplink

CHANNELS.description: Enter True if you want the bot to work in Channels also else Leave it as it is

CHANNEL_ID.description: Enter your Channel ID, Leave this to deafault if CHANNELS set to False

FORWARD_MESSAGE.description: Enter True if you want to edit forwarded message also in your channel. Entering True will delete the forwarded post in your channel and repost it with shorten link. Leave this to deafault if CHANNELS set to False

ADMINS.description: Your Telegram ID and ID of Users you want add as Admin. Separate each ID by comma.
